physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features numerous watercrafts on a body of water. The rays of the sun can be seen to be projecting onto the water at the upper right hand side. Some of the watercrafts have poles attached to them. Several smaller boats can be seen
 and the silhouettes of people on them can be seen.
